title: China gloom: The 'Are you dead?' app is dead, and a 'crying horse' plushie is selling out
summary_full: China shut down the "Are you dead" app, but the "crying horse" is selling out as the country grapples with a slowing economy and uncertainty.
summary_public: China shut down the "Are you dead" app, but the "crying horse" is selling out as the country grapples with a slowing economy and uncertainty.
